https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ca5bc0d1-ae8f-4d97-afb9-c5b7d13731ce

You can see when we are clicking on 'products' or 'community' , the github icon is not visible properly. Also the font size is too large (not adjustable) for mobile devices.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9322
activity.text:
> It's still there...
> 
> Easiest way to revert changes to the original file is to just run the following and committing the changes
> 
> ```shell
> wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/refs/heads/develop/package-lock.json
> ```

Thank you for the help and sorry for the inconvenience. I have run the above command as you instructed. Since 'wget' is not installed on my MacOS so I have run the below command: 
` curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/refs/heads/develop/package-lock.json `

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9143
activity.text:
> As per FHIR Spec, any string can be used as a patient name, some countries allow names with numbers to exist legally, we cannot create this validation. [@rithviknishad](https://github.com/rithviknishad) close this issue and all related issues.

Thank you @vigneshhari for the clarification. Got to know a new thing.
